About Me

Hi I’m Andrew.
For as long as I can remember, I’ve had a passion for software. It’s a little like magic: with the right combination of words, you can create something where once there was nothing.

I’ve also always had an entrepreneurial mindset, and the power that software has to unlock business potential is truly fascinating to me.

But more than anything, I like a challenge. I love performing analysis: connecting disparate, latent sources of information to extract data and create actionable business intelligence.

It’s at this intersection of technology, business, and analysis that I am building my career.

Data Analyst, Creative Systems and Consulting

Jan 2021 — Present

Data Analysis and Business Intelligence using Python, R, SQL, and Tableau CRM.

Full Stack Developer, AgReach

2017 — 2018

Created first-of-its-kind cloud backed mobile application, the AgReach Extension Helper, to facilitate agricultural extension work in rural Malawi. This application allows extension workers to more efficiently connect with smallholder farmers, while also providing easy visualization of KPIs to relevant stakeholders through a custom reporting dashboard.

Cyber and Language Analyst, US Army / NSA

2010 — 2016

If I told you, I'd have to kill you. Just kidding. But seriously, there's this complicated process where I have to get approval for what I can list on my resume/public websites. I'd be glad to talk about what I can during an interview, though. ;)
